text:
I think it would be helpful if Jmeter supported the concept of suites, where aq 
collection of smaller .jmx files can be linked dynamically to compose 
the "suite". Such that the smaller scripts could be modified and those changes 
be reflected in the suites. Right now, suites can be built but they use static 
copies of other .jmx files.
